definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">WITHER</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">25</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">294000</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">WEAKNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">12</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">294000</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">SLOWNESS</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">294000</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_fire"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="seconds"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">60</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:NybrickIngot</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
